ya2.2.3:1.1_0: Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti? No.

ya2.2.3:3.1_0: Yassa vedanākkhandho uppajjati tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhatīti? No.

ya2.2.3:5.1_0: Yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?

ya2.2.3:7.1_0: Yattha vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhati tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjatīti?
ya2.2.3:8.1_0: Arūpe tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhati, no ca tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjati.

ya2.2.3:15.1_0: Yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjati tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhatīti?
ya2.2.3:16.1_0: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati.

ya2.2.3:17.1_0: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhati tassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjatīti?

ya2.2.3:112.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjatīti?
ya2.2.3:113.1_0: Asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjati.
ya2.2.3:113.1_1: Parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjati.
ya2.2.3:114.1_0: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjati tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:115.1_0: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjati, no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:115.1_1: Parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjati saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:116.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.3:117.1_0: Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjittha tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:118.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:118.1_1: Itaresaṁ tesaṁ rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:119.1_0: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.3:120.1_0: Yassa vedanākkhandho uppajjittha tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:121.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ saññākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:121.1_1: Itaresaṁ tesaṁ vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:122.1_0: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
ya2.2.3:124.1_0: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:125.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:125.1_1: Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:126.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:127.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:127.1_1: Itaresaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:128.1_0: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:129.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:129.1_1: Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:130.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:131.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:131.1_1: Itaresaṁ catuvokārānaṁ pañcavokārānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:132.1_0: Yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.3:133.1_0: Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:134.1_0: Yassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti? Natthi.
ya2.2.3:135.1_0: Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthāti? Uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:137.1_0: Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:138.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:138.1_1: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:139.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:140.1_0: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:140.1_1: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ arūpe parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:141.1_0: Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:142.1_0: Suddhāvāsaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:142.1_1: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjittha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:143.1_0: Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:144.1_0: Parinibbantānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:144.1_1: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjittha.
